messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] testing???
messages.msgSnippet: egroups was doing some d*mn thing that was generating all kinds of messages including Connection reset by mx1.egroups.com  I happened to be one of the lucky
messages.messageBody:
egroups was doing some d*mn thing that was generating all kinds of messages
including "Connection reset by mx1.egroups.com" I happened to be one of
the lucky ones that somehow managed to have my messages float around in
cyberspace and eventually get where they were sent. . .hours later. Other
folks were not so lucky, or so it would appear.

Lynda, who HATES egroups!!!

----------
> From: MysticMoon56@...
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] testing???
> Date: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 9:29 AM

until

you
